016package com.exoreaction.xorcery.keystores;
017
018import com.exoreaction.xorcery.configuration.Configuration;
019import com.exoreaction.xorcery.secrets.Secrets;
020import jakarta.inject.Inject;
021import org.glassfish.hk2.api.messaging.Topic;
022import org.jvnet.hk2.annotations.ContractsProvided;
023import org.jvnet.hk2.annotations.Service;
024
025import java.security.KeyStore;
026import java.security.NoSuchAlgorithmException;
027import java.security.NoSuchProviderException;
028
029@Service(name = "keystores")
030@ContractsProvided({KeyStores.class})
031public class KeyStoresHK2 extends KeyStores {
032
033    private final Topic<KeyStore> keyStoreTopic;
034
035    @Inject
036    public KeyStoresHK2(Configuration configuration, Secrets secrets,Topic<KeyStore> keyStoreTopic) throws NoSuchAlgorithmException, NoSuchProviderException {
037        super(configuration, secrets);
038        this.keyStoreTopic = keyStoreTopic;
039    }
040
041    @Override
042    protected void publish(KeyStore keyStore) {
043        keyStoreTopic.publish(keyStore);
044    }
045}
